item.description:
Does anyone really know whats in a Sidecar?? Well join me at the Sidebar and well find out...Plus they have .10 cent wings after 5 and a Cheeseburger, Fries and a Bud for 6.95!! The is the first day of work after a long presidents day weekend so Meetup with us after you are off to let go of that one day worth of stress! Ill be there at 530 and stay til about 730-800 so stop by when you can!! The Sidebar is downtown at 14 Bromfield St. Here is the site http://www.sidebarbos...

Please maintain your own tab or pay as you go - Thank You
item.how_to_find_us: Ill be wearing my fleece scarf again....the color...Why Pink of course!
item.why: You'll enjoy yourself because we are a fun bunch!
item.name: What is in a Sidecar?
